roleset.name: bloom or blossom
roleset.note: FLOWER-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from flower.01-v)

example.name: ARG1
example.text: To highlight the Asian tropical landscape and nationalities ' characteristics in the urban park greenification , Nanning City has planted a great quantity of plants of the palms family and blossoming tall trees , flowering shrubs , colorful foliage plants , ground cover plants , lawns , etc.
